summary: Known to her clients as Dagmar, she's a classy Swedish call girl in Copenhagen. After two years, she's ready quit, and we follow her on what she hopes is her last day in the trade. She ... See full summary »
cast: Diana Kjær|Robert Strauss|Anne Grete Nissen|Ole Søltoft|Annelie Alexandersson|Poul Bundgaard|Inger Sundh|Tommy Blom|Tor Isedal|Svend Johansen|Manne Grünberger|Göthe Grefbo|Lars Söderström|Marrit Ohlsson|Cecil Cheng|Bobby Kwan|John Harryson|Karl Erik Flens|Ing-Margret Lackne|Monica Lindberg|Lars Granberg|Gus Dahlström|Helli Louise|Britt Marie Engstroem|Harriet Efies|Britten Larsson|Solveig Andersson|Lena Bergqvist|Anita Ziegler|Karin Almqvist|Jeanette Swensson|Åke Fridell
title: Dagmars Heta Trosor
